Package com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class Importer

java.lang.Object
com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.Importer
public final class Importer extends Object
Essentially, an instance of this class implements import-directives.
Author:
Mackenzie High

  • Constructor Details

    • Importer

      public Importer(ModuleCompiler module)
      Sole Constructor.
      Parameters:
      module - is essentially the module that is being compiled.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if module is null.

  • Method Details

    • imported

      public Set<String> imported()
      This method creates a set containing the fully-qualified names of the imported types.
      Returns:
      the aforedescribed immutable set.

    • resolveReturnType

      public IReturnType resolveReturnType(TypeSpecifier specifier)
      This method retrieves the type that is specified by a type-specifier.

      This method causes a compiler-warning to be issued, if the specified type is either non existent or inaccessible.

      This method causes a compiler-warning to be issued, if the specified type is not a return-type.

      Parameters:
      specifier - specifies the type to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the specified type, if it exists and is accessible.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the specifier is null.
      TypeCheckFailed - if the specified type is either non existent or inaccessible.
      TypeCheckFailed - if the specified type is not a return-type.

    • resolveVariableType

      public IVariableType resolveVariableType(TypeSpecifier specifier)
      This method retrieves the type that is specified by a type-specifier.

      This method causes a compiler-warning to be issued, if the specified type is either non existent or inaccessible.

      This method causes a compiler-warning to be issued, if the specified type is not a variable-type.

      Parameters:
      specifier - specifies the type to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the specified type, if it exists and is accessible.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the specifier is null.
      TypeCheckFailed - if the specified type is either non existent or inaccessible.
      TypeCheckFailed - if the specified type is not a variable-type.

    • importType

      public void importType(String alias, String type)
      This method creates a type-alias.
      Parameters:
      alias - is the alias to use for the type.
      type - is the fully-qualified name of the type.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if alias is null.
      NullPointerException - if type is null.

    • importClass

      public void importClass(Class type)
      This method creates a type-alias.
      Parameters:
      type - is the type to import.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if type is null.
